ygData.subject: fixed temperature profile
ygData.msgSnippet: I am just starting my move from chemkin to cantera. I would appreciate very much if somebody can explain me how can I make a calculation of a burner stabilized

I am just starting my move from chemkin to cantera. I would appreciate very 
much if somebody can explain me how can I make a calculation of a burner 
stabilized flame with an experimentally measured temperature profile. As I 
understand, in the demos (both python and matlab) the temperature profile is 
calculated assuming the flame to be adiabatic. What do I need to change in 
the demos (matlab and/or python) in order to used a fixed temperature 
profile?
Thank you
Sergey
